backup.title: Backup & Recovery
backup.desc: Export or import your quiz data (Einstellungen, Fortschritt, Abzeichen).

export.fileName: The text "quiz-backup.json" is a filename and does not require translation into English as it is already in English.

toast.backupBeforeImport: A backup was saved before import.

cache.help: Speeds up queries through local payment cache, but may extend initial loading time.
cache.label: Use cache (Beta)
cache.prefetchHelp: Lead time for loading entries/transactions in days (einmalig beim ersten Aktivieren)

network.title: Network
network.desc: Optional: Full-History Horizon for Deep History
network.autoUseFull: Automatically use if the "From Date" is older than the server history.
network.historyInfo: The free Horizon servers operated by the Stellar Development Foundation provide only about one year of history. For older data, you must either operate your own Horizon node or rely on third-party or paid services.

description: Currently, there are no settings available.
